docs.snippet: Tha latest reports from Charleston, telegraphed on Saturday, taken in connection with the fact that telegraphic communication with the South has been cut off below Petersburgh, Va, render it extremely probable that actual war has at last been...
docs.lead_paragraph: Tha latest reports from Charleston, telegraphed on Saturday, taken in connection with the fact that telegraphic communication with the South has been cut off below Petersburgh, Va, render it extremely probable that actual war has at last been commenced by the Secessionists, and that the bombardment of Fort Sumpter is now proceeding.
